languageKey.label: Total number of IPs
Total number of IPs found in the IP list at log time
Allowed IPs
Allowed IPs are all IPs with blockfe+blockhtaccess+blockforever=0. None of the blockin flags is set to 1
Allowed crawlers
Among the Allowed IPs these are the IPs with pattern "crawler" in the comment
Blocked crawlers
When blockhtaccess+blockforever>0 and blocking origin is "crawler blocklist", then the IP counts into the number of blocked crawlers
Blocked by local IP block list
IPs found in ext:toctoc_comments local IP block list are shown with this number
Blocked by imported IP block list
IPs found in ext:toctoc_comments imported IP block list (spamhaus.org) are shown with this number
Blocked by abuseipdb.com
Total number of IPs because they are present in the abuseipdb.com database
Blocked by TYPO3 syslog
Number of IPs blocked because they were found in the syslog and caused errors matching to a pattern defined in TypoScript-Setup-option "blockBySysLog.identificationList"
Number of IPs blocked by .htaccess
IPs blocked by .htaccess have field blockhtaccess=1. They are maintained in .htaccess in an interval which is defined in TypoScript-option recheckHtaccessForUnblockAfterMinutes
Formerly blocked IPs
Formerly blocked IPs are allowed IPs, but will recheck immediately when they come back, if recheck is successful their blockfe-flag is set back to 0
Optional comment on a log entry
Log entry comments can be added by the user, whenever this should be needed
